description: “This has always been an incredible event—and this year, it’s more important than ever.”#M365CON is where Copilot, community, and career growth come together. Join me for amazing content and face time with the people building the future of #Microsoft365Join BindTuning for amazing content and real face time with the people building the future of #Microsoft365. Let’s connect and shape what’s next—together.#M365 #Copilot #Community #Microsoft365Events …more
